Keywords: Amazon , Deity , Justice League , Past , Politician , Soldier , Warrior
Real Name: Diana Prince
Special Powers
EMISSARY OF PEACE: Super Senses. When Wonder Woman use it and succeeds, she can't be targeted by range attacks this turn.
PEACE BY WHATEVER MEANS NECESSARY: Incapacitate. // When an opposing character within range with 2 action tokens would be given an action token, after resolutions gain 1 MISSION POINT.
PACIFIST TACTICS: Charge. // Friendly characters that can use Incapacitate can use Charge.
WHAT WOULD YOU HAVE ME DO?: Once per turn, when an opposing character within range and line of fire attacks a character of equal or more points than themselves, after resolutions you may give the attacker an action token.
